Skeleton horse sounds are the sounds of the regular horse but lower pitched and slowed with reverb. Despite being monsters, skeleton horses use the "Friendly Mobs" sound category.<ref>{{bug|MC-304386||Undead mounts use the friendly mobs sound category, which is inconsistent|Working as Intended}}</ref>
